#include <stdio.h>
#define LL long long
#include <string.h>

int main(void) {

	
              int t,i;
              
              scanf("%d",&t);
              while(t--)
          
            {
                
                LL n,j,k,l=0,c=1;
                scanf("%lld",&n);
                LL a[n],big;
                
                for(i=0;i<n;i++)
                {
                   scanf("%lld",&a[i]);
                   
                   if(i==0)
                    big=a[0];
                    
                    else
                    {
                        if(a[i]>big)
                        {
                            big=a[i];
                            l=i;
                        }
                    }
                }
                                  

                
            for(i=0;i<n;i++)
                {
                 if(i!=l)
                   {
                       LL r=big/a[i];
                       while(r%3==0 || r%5==0)
                       {
                           if(r%3==0)
                            r=r/3;
                           if(r%5==0)
                            r=r/5;
                           
                           
                       }
                       if(r==1)
                        c++;
                   }
                }
                if(c==n)
                 printf("Yes\n");
                 else
                  printf("No\n");
            }
	return 0;
}
